title: Galadriel, Lady of the Golden Wood (3R17)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Ally • Home 6 • Elf
Strength:	3
Vitality:	3
Site:	6
Game Text:	At the start of each of your turns, you may heal an Elf. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play the fellowship's next site if it is a forest (replacing opponent's site if necessary).
Lore:	”'There is in her and in this land no evil, unless a man bring it hither himself. Then let him beware!'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: EXL
